verses.verse: Now there <S%H6817>cried<s%> a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> of the <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> to <S%H477>Elisha,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead;<s%> and you <S%H3045>know<s%> that your <S%H5650>servant<s%> did <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H5383>creditor<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> to him my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3206>sons<s%> to be <S%H5650>slaves.<s%>

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for you? <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3426>have<s%> you in the <S%H1004>house?<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> Your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> has not <S%H3605>any<s%> thing in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> a <S%H610>pot<s%> of <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H7592>borrow<s%> you <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> even <S%H7385>empty<s%> <S%H3627>vessels;<s%> borrow not a <S%H4591>few.<s%>

And when you are <S%H935>come<s%> in, you shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> on you and on your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> out <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and you shall <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>aside<s%> that which is <S%H4392>full.<s%>

So she <S%H3212>went<s%> from him, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> on her and on her <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> the vessels to her; and she <S%H3332>poured<s%> out.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were <S%H4390>full,<s%> that she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H5066>Bring<s%> me yet a <S%H3627>vessel.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, There is not a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%> And the <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5975>stayed.<s%>

Then she <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H4376>sell<s%> the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H7999>pay<s%> your <S%H5386>debt,<s%> and <S%H2421>live<s%> you and your <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3498>rest.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>fell<s%> on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> to <S%H7766>Shunem,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H802>woman;<s%> and she <S%H2388>constrained<s%> him to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%> And so it was, that as <S%H1767>oft<s%> as he <S%H5674>passed<s%> by, he <S%H5493>turned<s%> in <S%H8033>thither<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H3045>perceive<s%> that <S%H1931>this<s%> is an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> which <S%H5674>passes<s%> by us <S%H8548>continually.<s%>

Let us <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5944>chamber,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, on the <S%H7023>wall;<s%> and let us <S%H7760>set<s%> for him <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and a <S%H7979>table,<s%> and a <S%H3678>stool,<s%> and a <S%H4501>candlestick:<s%> and it shall be, when he <S%H935>comes<s%> to us, that he shall <S%H5493>turn<s%> in <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>fell<s%> on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and he <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5944>chamber,<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%> And when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> to her, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> you have been <S%H2729>careful<s%> for us with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H2731>care;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for you? <S%H3426>would<s%> you be <S%H1696>spoken<s%> for to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host?<s%> And she <S%H559>answered,<s%> I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> my own <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> then is to be <S%H6213>done<s%> for her? And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H61>Truly<s%> she has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>child,<s%> and her <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H2204>old.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> her. And when he had <S%H7121>called<s%> her, she <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> About <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4150>season,<s%> according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> you shall <S%H2263>embrace<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H408>No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> you <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> do not <S%H3576>lie<s%> to your <S%H8198>handmaid.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> at that <S%H4150>season<s%> that <S%H477>Elisha<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> to her, according to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%>
And when the <S%H3206>child<s%> was <S%H1431>grown,<s%> it <S%H1961>fell<s%> on a <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he <S%H3318>went<s%> out to his <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H7114>reapers.<s%>
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> My <S%H7218>head,<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> to a <S%H5288>lad,<s%> <S%H5375>Carry<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother.<s%>

And when he had <S%H5375>taken<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> he <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H6672>noon,<s%> and then <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And she <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4296>bed<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the door on him, and <S%H3318>went<s%> out.

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> to her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>Send<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5288>young<s%> men, and <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H860>asses,<s%> that I may <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> will you <S%H1980>go<s%> to him to <S%H3117>day?<s%> it is <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath.<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> It shall be <S%H7965>well.<s%>

Then she <S%H2280>saddled<s%> an <S%H860>ass,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H5090>Drive,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> forward; <S%H6113>slack<s%> not your <S%H7392>riding<s%> for me, <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> I <S%H559>bid<s%> you.

So she <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3760>Carmel.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her <S%H5048>afar<s%> off, that he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> yonder is that <S%H7767>Shunammite:<s%>

<S%H7323>Run<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, to <S%H7125>meet<s%> her, and <S%H559>say<s%> to her, Is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with you? is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with your <S%H376>husband?<s%> is it <S%H7965>well<s%> with the <S%H3206>child?<s%> And she <S%H559>answered,<s%> It is <S%H7965>well:<s%>

And when she <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> she <S%H2388>caught<s%> him by the <S%H7272>feet:<s%> but <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H1920>thrust<s%> her away. And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let her <S%H7503>alone;<s%> for her <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H4843>vexed<s%> within her: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5956>hid<s%> it from me, and has not <S%H5046>told<s%> me.
Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> Did I <S%H7592>desire<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> of my <S%H113>lord?<s%> did I not <S%H559>say,<s%> Do not <S%H7952>deceive<s%> me?

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> <S%H2296>Gird<s%> up your <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> your way: <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H4672>meet<s%> any <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H1288>salute<s%> him not; and <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H1288>salute<s%> you, <S%H6030>answer<s%> him not again: and <S%H7760>lay<s%> my <S%H4938>staff<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child.<s%>

And the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> and as your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> I will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> you. And he <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3112>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> her.

And <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4938>staff<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H5288>child;<s%> but there was <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H7182>hearing.<s%> Why he <S%H7725>went<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> him, and <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5288>child<s%> is not <S%H6974>awaked.<s%>
And when <S%H477>Elisha<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5288>child<s%> was <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> on his <S%H4296>bed.<s%>
He <S%H935>went<s%> in therefore, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> on them <S%H8147>two,<s%> and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> on the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> on his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and his <S%H3709>hands<s%> on his <S%H3709>hands:<s%> and <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself on the child; and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> waxed <S%H2552>warm.<s%>

Then he <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> to and <S%H259>fro;<s%> <S%H2008><s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H1457>stretched<s%> himself on him: and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H2237>sneezed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1522>Gehazi,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7767>Shunammite.<s%> So he <S%H7121>called<s%> her. And when she was <S%H935>come<s%> in to him, he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5375>Take<s%> up your <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Then she <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> herself to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> up her <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out.

And <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal:<s%> and there was a <S%H7458>dearth<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: and he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H8239>Set<s%> on the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5518>pot,<s%> and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> <S%H5138>pottage<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets.<s%>

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H219>herbs,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and <S%H3950>gathered<s%> thereof <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H6498>gourds<s%> his <S%H899>lap<s%> <S%H4393>full,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6398>shred<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5518>pot<s%> of <S%H5138>pottage:<s%> for they <S%H3045>knew<s%> them not.

So they <S%H3332>poured<s%> out for the <S%H582>men<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as they were <S%H398>eating<s%> of the <S%H5138>pottage,<s%> that they <S%H6817>cried<s%> out, and <S%H559>said,<s%> O you <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> there is <S%H4194>death<s%> in the <S%H5518>pot.<s%> And they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> Then <S%H3947>bring<s%> <S%H7058>meal.<s%> And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H5518>pot;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3332>Pour<s%> out for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat.<s%> And there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1697>harm<s%> <S%H7451><s%> in the <S%H5518>pot.<s%>

And there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> from <S%H1190>Baalshalisha,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the first <S%H1061>fruits,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%> of <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and full <S%H3759>ears<s%> of <S%H3759>corn<s%> in the <S%H6861>husk<s%> thereof. And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And his <S%H8334>servitor<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What,<s%> should I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men?<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> again, <S%H5414>Give<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat:<s%> for <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> They shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> and shall <S%H3498>leave<s%> thereof.
So he <S%H5414>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and they did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H3498>left<s%> thereof, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
